svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 6, 2024" date: "2024-04-05"
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Recap from Alex Stokes . Notes from Christine Kim : Missed slots : Lighthouse &
Prysm updated to allow Beacon API submission of blobs even if block observed on p2p Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024)
Electra included EIPs : Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready EIP7002
execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial withdrawals EIP7251 maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom
ceilings & EL initiated consolidations (touches EIP7002) at cost of added complexity EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may
update for better packing efficiency Electra candidates for inclusion: EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility issues EIP7594
PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could alternatively include EIP7659 to increase blob throughput
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Recap from Alex Stokes . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Missed slots : Lighthouse & Prysm updated to allow Beacon API submission of blobs even if block observed on p2p
Missed slots : Lighthouse & Prysm updated to allow Beacon API submission of blobs even if block observed on p2p
• Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) Electra included EIPs : Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker EIP6110
validator deposits onchain : mostly ready EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial withdrawals EIP7251
maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated consolidations (touches EIP7002) at cost of added complexity
EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may update for better packing efficiency Electra candidates for inclusion: EIP7547 IL
(inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility issues EIP7594 PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could
alternatively include EIP7659 to increase blob throughput
• Electra included EIPs : Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready EIP7002
• Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker
Pectra-devnet-0 spec EIP client implementation tracker
• EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready
EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : mostly ready
• EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial withdrawals
EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits: needs updating to handle partial withdrawals
• EIP7251 maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated consolidations (touches EIP7002) at cost of added
EIP7251 maxEB : community input wanted on need for custom ceilings & EL initiated consolidations (touches EIP7002) at cost of added
• EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may update for better packing efficiency
EIP7549 committee index outside attestation : may update for better packing efficiency
• Electra candidates for inclusion: EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility issues
• EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) : EIP3074 compatibility issues
• EIP7594 PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could alternatively include EIP7659 to increase blob
EIP7594 PeerDAS : work on in parallel to Electra, if going to be longer term could alternatively include EIP7659 to increase blob
• EIP7251 maxEB (increase max effective balance) Breakout call notes : custom ceilings, min activation balance constant, week subjectivity
• Breakout call notes : custom ceilings, min activation balance constant, week subjectivity issues and concerns from Lido
• EIP7547 IL (inclusion lists) Breakout call notes : potential solutions for validity & availability issues
• Breakout call notes : potential solutions for validity & availability issues
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 29.68% finally drops below 30%, still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 29.68% finally drops below 30%, still too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 63% majority Stakefish migrated to 50% Nethermind Consensus layer:
Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality Strategy to target largest concentrated actor with discouragement attack
• Execution layer: Geth 63% majority Stakefish migrated to 50% Nethermind
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Strategy to target largest concentrated actor with discouragement attack
Strategy to target largest concentrated actor with discouragement attack
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
• Reward curve with tempered issuance : trade-offs, security considerations and endgame
• Consensus layer: Prysm v5.0.3 : patch with enhancements & bug fixes
• Prysm v5.0.3 : patch with enhancements & bug fixes
• Execution layer: Reth v0.2.0-beta.5 : fixes Merkle pipeline stage out of memory issue, adds pruner timeout and supports running on NFS
• Reth v0.2.0-beta.5 : fixes Merkle pipeline stage out of memory issue, adds pruner timeout and supports running on NFS volumes
• Base gas target increased to 5 mgas/s
• EIPs: EIP7666 : EVM-ify the identity precompile EIP7667 : Raise gas costs of hash functions EIP7668 : Remove bloom filters EIP7669 :
Linear EVM memory limits EIP7670 : Reduced attestation format EIP7675 : Retroactively included EIPs EIP7676 : EOF - Prepare for address
• EIP7667 : Raise gas costs of hash functions
EIP7667 : Raise gas costs of hash functions
• EIP7676 : EOF - Prepare for address space extension
EIP7676 : EOF - Prepare for address space extension
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7672 : Event-driven NFT utilities ERC7673 : Distinguishable base256emoji addresses ERC7674 : Temporary
approval extension for ERC20 ERC7677 : Paymaster web service capability ERC7679 : UserOperation builder
• ERC7674 : Temporary approval extension for ERC20
ERC7674 : Temporary approval extension for ERC20
• Solidity Developer Survey 2023 results : Hardhat usage at 33%, Foundry 32% & Remix 26% Solidity v0.8 usage at 82%
• Guide to migrate from from hardhat-deploy to Hardhat Ignition
Guide to migrate from from hardhat-deploy to Hardhat Ignition
• Tweak (Foundry fork): alter onchain verified contracts (e.g. add console.log) & replay historical transactions
Tweak (Foundry fork): alter onchain verified contracts (e.g. add console.log) & replay historical transactions
• Hayden asked should Uniswap v4 remove events & move to call traces for 1% gas saving on swaps Lefteris: need agreement & standardization
Hayden asked should Uniswap v4 remove events & move to call traces for 1% gas saving on swaps
• OpenSea ERC721C support : enforced creator royalties but restricted to OpenSea & Magic Eden
OpenSea ERC721C support : enforced creator royalties but restricted to OpenSea & Magic Eden
• Fuzz-utils v0.2.0 : generate Echidna/Medusa compatible fuzzing harnesses
Fuzz-utils v0.2.0 : generate Echidna/Medusa compatible fuzzing harnesses
• Sigmund (CLI): collect function selectors from any contract
Sigmund (CLI): collect function selectors from any contract
• Swiss knife determine contract address using deployer address & nonce
Swiss knife determine contract address using deployer address & nonce
• SIWE AAbstractor : connect smart accounts to apps via Sign in with Ethereum
SIWE AAbstractor : connect smart accounts to apps via Sign in with Ethereum
• Viem experimental : support for draft EIP5792 (batch transactions with paymaster capability)
Viem experimental : support for draft EIP5792 (batch transactions with paymaster capability)
• Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): minimal implementations of ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
Noble-post-quantum (JavaScript): minimal implementations of ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
• Open Labels Initiative : framework & data model for EVM address labeling
Open Labels Initiative : framework & data model for EVM address labeling
• CTFs: Secureum RACE #28 : 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
• Secureum RACE #28 : 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
• Geth DoS vulnerability disclosed , nodes with exposed RPC could be crashed by applying EIPs out of order during an eth_call, fixed in
• Vitalik: next steps in the Purge , precompiles, history (via EIP4444), log reform & moving to SSZ
Vitalik: next steps in the Purge , precompiles, history (via EIP4444), log reform & moving to SSZ
• Project Agorá : BIS & 7 central banks explore tokenization of cross-border payments
• ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering and Senior Product Manager
ChainSafe: Head of Protocol Engineering and Senior Product Manager
• Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
• Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
Nethermind Mechanism Designer , Protocol Research Manager , Research Engineer
• Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
Certora is hiring: Head of Product , SR-Rust , Compiler Developer & FV Wizard
• Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
• 🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
🔥OpenZeppelin seeks Security Researchers in Canada , Australia , LatAm & USA
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 8.6 to 120.5 gwei, with 25.8 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 22.7 gwei 2.8k ETH net burn
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 8.6 to 120.5 gwei, with 25.8 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.7 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.7 gwei
• Maker's big bet on Ethena Aave proposes 0% LTV for Dai in response
• Aave proposes 0% LTV for Dai in response
• Synthetix v3 live on Base, using USDC as collateral
Synthetix v3 live on Base, using USDC as collateral
• Gitcoin Grants 20 applications open until April 16; open source software rounds: infrastructure, dev tooling, apps and hackathon alumni
Gitcoin Grants 20 applications open until April 16; open source software rounds: infrastructure, dev tooling, apps and hackathon alumni
• US vs Roman Storm: amicus briefs from Blockchain Association , Coin Center & DeFi Education Fund
US vs Roman Storm: amicus briefs from Blockchain Association , Coin Center & DeFi Education Fund
• SEC Commissioner Peirce: improving communication between public & SEC
SEC Commissioner Peirce: improving communication between public & SEC
• Bank of England & FCA digital securities sandbox consultation, feedback by May 29
Bank of England & FCA digital securities sandbox consultation, feedback by May 29
• Vitalik: degen communism [posted April 1], chaos aligned with common good, e.g. memecoin issuance to charity, public goods funding, fork
out concentrated players, land value taxes and Harberger taxes on IP
Vitalik: degen communism [posted April 1], chaos aligned with common good, e.g. memecoin issuance to charity, public goods funding, fork
• XZ Utils (compression library) backdoored , v5.6.0/1 impacted, found after logins via ssh 0.5s slower
XZ Utils (compression library) backdoored , v5.6.0/1 impacted, found after logins via ssh 0.5s slower
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
• Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Jun 14 – EF EIP4844 data challenge deadline
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
